title: Are 49ers a Super Bowl contender? AFC North favorites; Comeback Player of the Year; Torry Holt
itunes:title: Are 49ers a Super Bowl contender? AFC North favorites; Comeback Player of the Year; Torry Holt
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Peter Schrager, Mike Garafolo and Super Bowl Champion Shaun O'Hara decipher if this San Francisco 49ers team is a dark horse Super Bowl contender ahead of their Thursday Night matchup against the Tennessee Titans. Then they share which AFC North team is the most intriguing; Schrager leads mixed bag trivia based on the Comeback Player of the Year; and lastly, they're joined by Torry Holt, who was a member of the 'Greatest Show on Turf' and he shares his thoughts about the Los Angeles Rams, Cooper Kupp being worthy of the MVP award, and getting Isaac Bruce into the hall of fame.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
